title: MehmetSayeed
author: MehmetSayeed
content: Looking for employees to work with cryptocurrencyOlder than 21 years oldWith knowledge of bank accountsContact with me in telegram @company_mng_mehmet

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: MehmetSayeed on May 25, 2023, 01:35:52 PMLooking for employees to work with cryptocurrencyOlder than 21 years oldWith knowledge of bank accountsContact with me in telegram @company_mng_mehmetBe more specific about the job! None of us would be interested if you only write a few points. Too many scams and scammers are out their. You being a newbie and posting a job offer on the first post won't help you. Thanks.

comments.author: omya
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on May 25, 2023, 03:34:48 PMQuote from: MehmetSayeed on May 25, 2023, 01:35:52 PMLooking for employees to work with cryptocurrencyOlder than 21 years oldWith knowledge of bank accountsContact with me in telegram @company_mng_mehmetBe more specific about the job! None of us would be interested if you only write a few points. Too many scams and scammers are out their. You being a newbie and posting a job offer on the first post won't help you. Thanks. +1

comments.author: Wapinter
comments.body: Quote from: MehmetSayeed on May 25, 2023, 01:35:52 PMLooking for employees to work with cryptocurrencyOlder than 21 years oldWith knowledge of bank accountsContact with me in telegram @company_mng_mehmetWhat kind of work you are offering? You provided very little info about the requirements for eligibility but no information about job is given. Please be more elaborative and give as much possible details. Also provide information about remuneration. You can definitely find many prospects here if your work is legal and you provide all the details. As other members have rightly pointed out, there are many scams in the name of crypto and anyone applying for this offer should proceed with caution.
